name: acp3/module-files
description: Provides the files module for the ACP3 CMS.

suggest.acp3/setup: Allows you to comfortably install and update the ACP3 components via an UI.
suggest.acp3/module-files-comments: Allows you to integrate the downloads module into the comments module.
suggest.acp3/module-files-feed: Allows you to integrate the downloads module into the feeds module.
suggest.acp3/module-files-search: Allows you to integrate the downloads module into the search module.
suggest.acp3/module-files-seo: Allows you to integrate the downloads module into the SEO module.
suggest.acp3/module-files-share: Allows you to integrate the downloads module into the social sharing module.
